attributes.action: Allow Civil Servants and Local Government Workers a 10% discount on Income tax, after 5 years service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would give all Civil Service and local government workers a boost to their salary, which in turn would make us all happier, and help us to work harder, and reduce the much publicised errors of recent months/years.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
